title: Wolfenstein.The.New.Order.Repack-R.G.Mechanics
description:
Wolfenstein.The.New.Order.Repack-R.G.Mechanics


Year: 2014
Genre: Action (Shooter) / 3D / 1st Person
Developer: Machine Games
Publisher: Bethesda Softworks
Publication Type: RePack
Game Language:Eng  | Rus
Voice Language: Eng
Crack: RELOADED

System requirements:

Operating system: 64-bit Windows 7/Windows 8
Processor: Intel Core i7 or equivalent AMD
Memory: 4 GB
Graphics card: GeForce 460, ATI Radeon HD 6850
Free space on hard disk: 50 GB

Description:

Mastering the hitherto unknown Supertehnologiya, Nazi Germany was able to turn the tide of war and brought 
to its knees, even the most powerful nations. War hero BJ Blaskowitz spent 14 years in a coma, and awoke to 
find that the yard in 1960, World War II was lost, and the Nazis rule the world with an iron fist. You will become 
Blaskowitz - the hero of a lost war and the only person in the world, capable of changing the course of history.

Features:

Adventure shooter. Wolfenstein - this crazy racing on the mountain slopes, the descent into the depths of the sea, 
the battle with the Fuhrer's military robots and more of what constitutes a truly exciting adventure.
The plot and characters. Tense fights, crazy plot twists and distinctive characters fused together into a story that 
will not leave anyone indifferent.
Alternative history. Familiar strangers postwar years - a world where the Nazis won World War II 
and mangled everything what they could reach.
Arsenal and opponents. Clandestine laboratories in the Reich and armories you will find the latest designs of deadly 
toys Fuhrer. Armed with them, you get a chance to cope with giant fighting robots, menacing and assault troops 
supersoldat Nazis.

Features repack

Wolfenstein: The New Order
Do not cut / recoded
